languages.text: "Я мечтала побывать на феодальном мире, сошедшем со страниц героических летописей. Но теперь... я мечтаю поскорее забыть об этом месте".

traits.locale_text: "Я мечтала побывать на феодальном мире, сошедшем со страниц героических летописей. Но теперь... я мечтаю поскорее забыть об этом месте".

languages.text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
languages.original_text: "Я мечтала побывать на феодальном мире, сошедшем со страниц героических летописей. Но теперь... я мечтаю поскорее забыть об этом месте".

traits.locale_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
"I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
"I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
"I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
"I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
"I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

languages.text: 「かつては封建惑星を訪れるのが夢でした。まるで英雄譚の一節から抜け出したような土地に憧れていたのです。ですが今は…今は、あの場所のことを忘れたいと願っています…一刻も早く」
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: 「かつては封建惑星を訪れるのが夢でした。まるで英雄譚の一節から抜け出したような土地に憧れていたのです。ですが今は…今は、あの場所のことを忘れたいと願っています…一刻も早く」

languages.text: "Ich habe früher immer davon geträumt, eine Feudalwelt zu besuchen, ein Land wie aus den Seiten der Heldenchroniken. Aber nun ... Nun träume ich davon, diese Welt zu vergessen. Je eher, desto besser."
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe früher immer davon geträumt, eine Feudalwelt zu besuchen, ein Land wie aus den Seiten der Heldenchroniken. Aber nun ... Nun träume ich davon, diese Welt zu vergessen. Je eher, desto besser."

languages.text: « J'ai longtemps nourri le rêve de visiter un monde féodal, une planète sortie tout droit des pages de chroniques héroïques. Mais maintenant... je rêve d'oublier cet endroit, et le plus tôt sera le mieux. »
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai longtemps nourri le rêve de visiter un monde féodal, une planète sortie tout droit des pages de chroniques héroïques. Mais maintenant... je rêve d'oublier cet endroit, et le plus tôt sera le mieux. »

languages.text: «Antes soñaba a menudo con visitar un mundo feudal, un lugar salido de las páginas de las crónicas heroicas. Pero ahora... Ahora sueño con olvidar ese lugar, y cuanto antes mejor».
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: «Antes soñaba a menudo con visitar un mundo feudal, un lugar salido de las páginas de las crónicas heroicas. Pero ahora... Ahora sueño con olvidar ese lugar, y cuanto antes mejor».

languages.text: “我曾梦想过参观封建世界，亲眼见证英雄传说中描述的奇妙土地。可现在……现在，我做梦都想赶紧忘了那个地方，越快越好。”
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: “我曾梦想过参观封建世界，亲眼见证英雄传说中描述的奇妙土地。可现在……现在，我做梦都想赶紧忘了那个地方，越快越好。”

languages.text: "Feodal dünyayı, kahramanların vakayinamelerine yazdıkları o diyarları ziyaret etmeyi düşlerdim hep. Şimdiyse tek dileğim, orayı bir an evvel unutmak..."
languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."

traits.locale_text: "Feodal dünyayı, kahramanların vakayinamelerine yazdıkları o diyarları ziyaret etmeyi düşlerdim hep. Şimdiyse tek dileğim, orayı bir an evvel unutmak..."

languages.original_text: "I used to dream of visiting a feudal world, a land straight out of the pages of heroic chronicles. But now... Now, I dream of forgetting that place — the sooner the better."
